Package com.mineinjava.quail.pathing

Class PathSequenceFollower

java.lang.Object
com.mineinjava.quail.pathing.PathSequenceFollower
public class PathSequenceFollower extends Object
DEPRECATED - DO NOT USE A class that helps you follow a sequence of paths

This is useful for autonomous, where you want to follow a path, then do something, then follow another path, etc.

    • addLocalTemporalMarker

      public PathSequenceFollower addLocalTemporalMarker(double delay, Runnable action)
      Add a temporal marker to the sequence (runs a runnable after a certain amount of local time)
      Parameters:
      delay - the delay after the last segment ends before marker is run (in seconds)
      action - the action to be completed by the marker
      Returns:
